slide.title: The Tidy Node

blurb.title: A tidy node is a PHP object

slide.blurb: Each node is an instance of the internal %tidy_node% class with the following structure:
slide.example:
<?php
class tidy_node {

    public $value;
    public $name;
    public $type;
    public $id;        /* $id Not always available, depends on type */
    
    public tidy_attr $attribute[];
    public tidy_node $child[];
    
    public function has_children();
    
    public function is_comment();
    public function is_html();
    public function is_text();
    public function is_jste();
    public function is_asp();
    public function is_php();
    
}
?>
